channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro, Inc. -- Trend Micro Apex One
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro, Inc. -- Trend Micro Apex One

item.title: CVE-2023-47200|2024-01-23T20:38:25.058Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
A plug-in manager origin validation vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One security agent could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
This vulnerability is similar to, but not identical to, CVE-2023-47201.

item.title: CVE-2023-47201|2024-01-23T20:38:38.453Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one

Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-32557|2023-06-26T21:57:00.765Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description: A path traversal vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service could allow an unauthenticated attacker to upload an arbitrary file to the Management Server which could lead to remote code execution with system privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-32556|2023-06-26T21:56:48.500Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
A link following vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service agent could allow a local attacker to disclose sensitive information.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-32555|2023-06-26T21:56:37.560Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
A Time-of-Check Time-Of-Use vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service agent could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations.
Please note: a local attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
This is similar to, but not identical to CVE-2023-32554.

item.title: CVE-2023-32553|2023-06-26T21:56:16.388Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
An Improper access control vulnerability in Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service could allow an unauthenticated user under certain circumstances to disclose sensitive information on agents.
This is similar to, but not identical to CVE-2023-32552.

item.title: CVE-2023-32552|2023-06-26T21:56:06.010Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one

item.description:
An anti-spyware engine link following vulnerability in Trend Micro Apex One could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-52092|2024-01-23T20:40:04.083Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
A security agent link following vulnerability in Trend Micro Apex One could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-52093|2024-01-23T20:40:17.347Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
An exposed dangerous function vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One agent could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-52094|2024-01-23T20:40:30.228Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
An updater link following vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One agent could allow a local attacker to abuse the updater to delete an arbitrary folder, leading for a local privilege escalation on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-41179|2023-09-21T12:26:39.088Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
A vulnerability in the 3rd party AV uninstaller module contained in Trend Micro Apex One (on-prem and SaaS), Worry-Free Business Security and Worry-Free Business Security Services could allow an attacker to manipulate the module to execute arbitrary commands on an affected installation.
Note that an attacker must first obtain administrative console access on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-34145|2023-06-26T21:57:50.324Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
An untrusted search path vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service security agent could allow a local attacker to escalate their privileges on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
This is a similar, but not identical vulnerability as CVE-2023-34144.

item.title: CVE-2023-34148|2023-06-26T21:58:19.771Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
An exposed dangerous function vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service security agent could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges and write an arbitrary value to specific Trend Micro agent subkeys on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
This is a similar, but not identical vulnerability as CVE-2023-34146 and CVE-2023-34147.

item.title: CVE-2023-34144|2023-06-26T21:57:41.700Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
An untrusted search path vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service security agent could allow a local attacker to escalate their privileges on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
This is a similar, but not identical vulnerability as CVE-2023-34145.

item.title: CVE-2023-34147|2023-06-26T21:58:09.816Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
An exposed dangerous function vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service security agent could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges and write an arbitrary value to specific Trend Micro agent subkeys on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
This is a similar, but not identical vulnerability as CVE-2023-34146 and CVE-2023-34148.

item.title: CVE-2023-34146|2023-06-26T21:58:00.477Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
An exposed dangerous function vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service security agent could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges and write an arbitrary value to specific Trend Micro agent subkeys on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
This is a similar, but not identical vulnerability as CVE-2023-34147 and CVE-2023-34148.

item.title: CVE-2023-30902|2023-06-26T21:52:39.860Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service agent could allow a local attacker to unintentionally delete privileged Trend Micro registry keys including its own protected registry keys on affected installations.

item.title: CVE-2023-25144|2023-03-10T20:05:13.704141Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description: An improper access control vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One agent could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges and create arbitrary directories with arbitrary ownership.

item.title: CVE-2023-25148|2023-03-10T20:05:13.704141Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
A security agent link following vulnerability in Trend Micro Apex One could allow a local attacker to exploit the vulnerability by changing a specific file into a pseudo-symlink, allowing privilege escalation on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-25145|2023-03-10T20:05:13.704141Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
A link following vulnerability in the scanning function of Trend Micro Apex One agent could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-25143|2023-03-10T20:05:13.704141Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description: An uncontrolled search path element vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One Server installer could allow an attacker to achieve a remote code execution state on affected products.

item.title: CVE-2023-25146|2023-03-10T20:05:13.704141Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
A security agent link following vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One agent could allow a local attacker to quarantine a file, delete the original folder and replace with a junction to an arbitrary location, ultimately leading to an arbitrary file dropped to an arbitrary location.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-25147|2023-03-10T20:05:13.704141Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
An issue in the Trend Micro Apex One agent could allow an attacker who has previously acquired administrative rights via other means to bypass the protection by using a specifically crafted DLL during a specific update process.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain administrative access on the target system via another method in order to exploit this.

item.description:

item.title: CVE-2024-36307|2024-06-11T14:35:52.547Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
A security agent link following vulnerability in Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service could allow a local attacker to disclose sensitive information about the agent on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-36306|2024-06-11T13:40:05.863Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
A link following vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service Damage Cleanup Engine could allow a local attacker to create a denial-of-service condition on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
